title: Graco SmartSeat All-in-One Car Seat
transcripts: The Smart Seat all in one car seat that fits children from 5 to 100 pounds. It has different modes of use for your growing child, as a rear facing seat for infants 5 to 40 pounds even past one year of age, as a forward facing seat using the harness for toddlers 20 to 65 pounds after one year, and as a belt positioning booster seat using the vehicle seat belt for children 30 to 100 pounds. Smart Seat is the only all in one car seat that includes a stay-in-car base. That means a onetime installation for use in both rear and forward facing modes. For your child's comfort and contentment, the Smart Seat features an integrated child's cup holder, flip up arm rests and on the go 5-position recline. The one hand adjustable headrest with no rethread harness automatically adjusts the height of the harness and head rest to meet the growing needs of your child.
